Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to labeling and sale of cloned animals and food products from cloned animals or the progeny of such animals
Summary: Requires disclosure and labeling of food products from cloned animals or the progeny of such animals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to labeling and sale of cloned animals and food products from cloned animals or the progeny of such animals
